How you can access your information

You can request access to the personal information we hold about you at any time. You can write to us at the following address requesting access to your personal information.

c/o Virgin Management Limited
The Battleship Building

London W2 6NB
UK
title: Although this service allows users to retrieve their data, the process is difficult and time-consuming.

tosdr.case: Unconvenient process for obtaining personal data
tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Privacy Policy: "You can request access to the personal information we hold about you at any time. You can write to us at the following address requesting access to your personal information." This is followed by a mailing address in London, United Kingdom. No other option is specified.
